about.description: I'm a full stack developer passionate about creating digital experiences that make a difference. With over 3 years of experience, I specialize in React, TypeScript and Node.js.
about.passion: My passion is transforming complex ideas into simple and intuitive interfaces, always focusing on user experience and code quality.
